title: Boron-mediated one-pot access to salicylaldehydes via ortho-C–H hydroxylation of benzaldehydes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19922-19925
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02994A, Paper
Open Access

Ruiyang Wang, Xu Feng, Boya Feng, Yu Chen
Described herein is a boron-mediated ortho-C–H hydroxylation of aromatic aldehydes assisted by a transient imine directing group, providing an efficient method for the synthesis of salicylaldehydes.
